column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - Lady of Shadows (2015) #2
column6: ODETTA HOLMES' CHAPTER IN STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC CONTINUES! • Witness the moment in Odetta's childhood that changed her forever - and forced her to come face to face with her darkest demons... • What does the Man in Black want with the young Odetta? And how does Odetta's destiny fit into Roland's quest to defeat the Crimson King?
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | penciller (cover):Nimit Malavia | artist:Jonathan Marks
